summary: When a sheriff arrests a writer, a family, a couple, and a hitchiker and throws them in a jail cell in the deserted town of Desperation, they must fight for their lives.
cast: Tom Skerritt|Steven Weber|Annabeth Gish|Charles Durning|Matt Frewer|Henry Thomas|Shane Haboucha|Kelly Overton|Sylva Kelegian|Ron Perlman|Sammi Hanratty|Ewan Chung|Alain Uy|Trieu Tran|Tom Parker|Darren Victoria|Glenn R. Wilder|Chris Calilung|Clint James
